channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Lifx Beam Review (2024): The Lifx Beam Isn't New, but It's Super Fun
item.description: These handy light bars have me quitting light strips.

item.title: Skyfire lets AI agents spend your money
item.description: There’s a lot of hype about the promise of AI agents today, but payments are a huge limiting factor. Today, an AI agent might be able to plan a vacation for you independently, but a human has to step in when it’s time to input your credit card information. Skyfire Systems wants to change that. […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: The Covid-19 Summer Wave Is So Big, the FDA Might Release New Vaccines Early
item.description: The latest Covid-19 surge reportedly has officials considering approval of the new strain-matched vaccine as soon as this week.

item.title: WeTransfer’s expiry dates haven’t gone away, but you can at least extend them
item.description: WeTransfer’s expiry dates have been a major paint-point for users — especially creatives. Thing is, if you don’t download the files the moment you get the link or email you can easily forget to do so before the link expires. At which point you’ll have to ask for it to be resent. Which can get […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Bowers & Wilkins Pi8 Earbuds Review: Soaring Sound, Clever Case
item.description: With punchy lows, a brilliant midrange, and nearly sky-high detail levels, there's no denying these are among the best-sounding in-ears around.

item.title: India’s trade minister decries e-commerce growth, Amazon’s ‘predatory’ pricing
item.description: India’s commerce minister Piyush Goyal on Wednesday expressed concern over the rapid growth of e-commerce in the country, warning of potential disruption to small retailers. Speaking at the launch of a report on the impact of e-commerce on employment and consumer welfare in India, Goyal said the projected dominance of online marketplaces in the coming […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: An AWS Configuration Issue Could Expose Thousands of Web Apps
item.description: Amazon has updated its instructions for how customers should more securely implement AWS's traffic-routing service known as Application Load Balancer, but it's not clear everyone will get the memo.

item.title: SleekFlow snaps up $7M to tap the conversational AI opportunity across Asia
item.description: SleekFlow, a Singapore- and Hong Kong-headquartered social commerce platform that has built a conversational AI suite for customer engagement targeted to Asian markets, said Wednesday it had secured a further $7 million in funding. The money will be used to continue developing its AI, as well as penetrate deeper into Southeast Asia and the Middle […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: 23 Best Back-to-School Deals (2024): Backpacks, Chargers, Laptops
item.description: It's time to put away the pool noodles and get those butts back in seats. Save on backpacks, iPads, laptops, and more.

item.title: The banks that loaned Musk $13B to buy Twitter might be having regrets
item.description: X, formerly known as Twitter, looks like a pretty bad investment right about now. As readers might recall, Elon Musk borrowed $13 billion from Morgan Stanley, Bank of America and five other major banks to help finance its $44 billion acquisition. According to the WSJ, the deal has since become the worst merger-finance deal for […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.
